title: AWS reports contain scientific notation characters in CSV format
content:
The AWS reports, when exported in .csv format, contain scientific notation characters in the Usage Account ID column of the Spend by Usage Account ID report as shown below:

Report as it appears in the CMP FinOps cost governance UI Report as it appears when exported in CSV format

Cause

This issue occurs because of the way the Microsoft Excel handles integers.

Workaround

Perform the following steps:

  1. Open the .csv file in Microsoft Excel.
  2. Select the Usage Account ID column (you should see your cursor turn into a down-arrow).
  3. Right click on the Usage Account ID column.
  4. Select Format Cells from the context menu.
    The Format Cells dialog appears.
  5. Select the Number category from the list on the left side of the dialog.
  6. Change the value for Decimal places to 0 and then click Ok.
  7. Optionally, you can save the file as an Excel workbook (.xlsx) to keep the formatting changes the next time you open this spreadsheet.
